name: nitinics.com
body:
### @nitinics
This is my personal page where you can view details about my work, life and things that keep me busy. In summary, you'll see that I am passionate about technology stack - specifically infrastructure, social changes, innovation and startup landscape, music, guitars and the future of network architectures.

### Affiliations
* [NYPNY](https://www.nypny.com) : Nepalese Young Professionals in New York, a social non-profit volunteer startup
* SDI : Software Defined *Infrastructure* (radio/networks/systems)
* Internet : The Infrastructure that holds the Internet together. 
* Wireless : Wireless *Anything* Networks (wifi/xbee/[mesh](http://www.nycmesh.net)/sensors/iot/rfid)

### Publications
* [Google Research](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=NEVCW1gAAAAJ&btnA=1)
* [Research Gate](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Nitin_Sharma64)

### Fun

### Contact
